snippet: The decision involved an inquiry into whether the Campaign for One New York, which supported the mayor’s political agenda, violated state regulations by failing to register in 2015 as a lobbyist....
abstract: Albany Supreme Court Justice Denise A Hartman orders Mayor Bill de Blasio's nonprofit Campaign for One New York to comply with Joint Commission on Public Ethics subpoena in investigation into whether organization violated state regulations by failing to register in 2015 as lobbyist; de Blasio is fighting to keep some requested records from being disclosed to reporters.
lead_paragraph: The decision involved an inquiry into whether the Campaign for One New York, which supported the mayor’s political agenda, violated state regulations by failing to register in 2015 as a lobbyist.

headline.main: De Blasio’s Nonprofit Must Comply With Ethics Panel’s Subpoena, Judge Says
headline.print_headline: Judge Tells de Blasio’s Nonprofit to Comply With Subpoena From Ethics Panel
